question: Which ex-India player awarded an honorary life membership to the Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC)?
explanation: The former India batsman V.V.S. Laxman became the latest ex-India player to be awarded an honorary life membership to the Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC). He scored 8,781 Test runs at an average of 45.97 and 2338 ODI runs at 30.76.
